She wanted to create the conclusion that it's to hard for a male to become a ninja to keep the male ninjas lower than the female. Thus, revolts could be prevented. Who is your partner?

It was Hinata. She stood in front of you with her hands folded in her lap."Would you like to be my partner?" : she asked. Hinata was definitely a better choice than the others since she was more nice to you than the others. The decision was easy and you agreed. She nodded joyfully: "I hope for a good cooperation." She performed the finger signs and turned the table beside her into a piece of clothing. "In order to dissolve the jutsu, you only have to make the same finger-signs in reverse order. But bare in mind, sometimes you can't turn the object back to it's original form." She executed the finger-signs in the reverse order, and the piece of clothing became a table again. You can now try it yourself. Find a free place and exercise. Hinata and you went into a corner and began to practice the jutsu. "So, what am I going to turn you into? You better decide for yourself, I do not want to make you unpleasant." :she asked. You answer her: "How about you turn me into a lion?" That would not be embarrassing. " She did the jutsu and suddenly you were a lion. After a short time she turned you back. "You seem to have mastered it already," you said. "Let us continue," she replied urgently. You saw that she was in a hurry. Only you had not noticed why. She shifted in her posture. A clear sign that she had to use the toilet or in the case her diaper. 112333331111.title: Hinata

1123333311111.content:
Looking down Hinata had a surprised look on her face. She certainly hadn't expected you to turn into a diaper!

As she looks down at your new body, she suddenly scrunches up her face and you saw and heard her diaper expand and puff out as she pooped herself again. Apparently you still have some of your senses. But how many and for how long?

As the Hyuuga heiress finishes going potty in her pants, she glances at both the garment around her waist and your now crinkly body. She looks down one more time at her dirty diaper, and seemingly reluctantly, reaches down and grabs you. It doesn't take a Yamanaka to know what's about to happen to you.

"I'm sorry" she says shyly "But I don't have any spares...and I don't think anyone else is willing to share"

With your new padded form in her grip, she lays out a changing mat and supplies and begins to change her diaper. While she gets everything ready you take the chance to go over your new situation.

You are a diaper now. And diapers don't last long, ESPECIALLY on a kunoichi. And you are perhaps a minute or two away from being strapped to the pasty butt of the biggest pooper in the entire year, barring your former sensei Anko Mitarashi. She even got a trophy for it, a small silver one, in the shape of diaper with a Leaf symbol on it.. As if to drive home what's happening, you see from a part of your body, Hinata lying on the ground her face, yet again, grimacing and flushed as she pushes another load into her diaper.

It is at this point your begin to smell again. Your first new smell is the stench of Hinata's stinky pants. The second comes quickly as practically all the remaining students, including Anko, begin to mess themselves.

Well that explains today's lesson. A way for a kunoichi to turn "useless material" into "viable clothing". Or in layman's terms, turning worthless teammates into fresh diapers to change into You wonder if someone has been turned into baby powder or oil before.

You are brought back to the present by the sound of tearing diaper tabs. Seems like Hinata is about ready. You realize however as you look around the room that you aren't moving but you can see everything in a, ironic, 360 degree vision. And as Hinata tapes you onto her waist and stands up you discover something else. The entirety of your body can feel. That....doesn't bode well considering what you are now, but still good to know that you have your faculties. And now you can say you've touched a girl's butt

Looking around it seemed all the other kunoichi had done the same thing, though obviously on purpose. As a result all the girls had varying diapers in front of them. Glancing over to Ino and Sakura, the two ninjas in training had wicked grins on their faces, as they took their former classmates and started to change into them. Though by the way your own experience was going they wouldn't be enjoying their new forms for long if at all.

"Again I'm truly sorry" the heiress whispers. You can't really hold it against her. Poor girl would've succumbed to horrendous peer pressure and persecution if she hadn't gone along with everyone. And there are worse people to be taped to, you muse as you watch Sakura's classmate-come-diaper expand nauseously as she goes potty in him.

As Hinata sits down you tune out Anko as she goes on about how "proud" she is about her class "making another messy milestone". You find it all too easy to tune her out.

Hours later the class breaks for lunch, and you hear your former classmates snicker and giggle about the huge dumps they'll take in their new diapers. Honestly at this point your surprised Hinata hasn't used you yet. Normally she has to be changed by Anko at least once per period, usually on the teacher's desk blushing up a storm.

As Hinata sits at a tree in the courtyard she ideally activates her Byakugan while eating lunch. She didn't trust her classmates to not scare her again. She wanted this diaper to last longer than few hours both for the sake of her former classmate and the fact she had nothing else to change with.

As she ate her bento she went to take another bite when she got a look at her diaper through her Kekkei Genkai.

Her eyes widened and she stopped chewing in surprise

........What on earth?

Her diaper....
1123333311111.title: She doesn't turn you back into a human and ...

11233333111111.content:
Hinata stared down at you in utter shock. She de- and re-activated her Byakugan on the off chance she was just seeing things. But as you again came into her vision she saw lines of chakra swirling through unseen ethereal veins in your plastic, cushy body.

You yourself were stunned (mentally) as she uttered her discovery. Chakra Coils? In a diaper? It seemed like a prank in bad taste, but Hinata was not known to be a prankster. That was Naruko's department.

How was this possible? You might have been human a few hours ago but right now you were an oversized BABY DIAPER. One who would probably be full soon if you were honest with yourself. Still how was this possible?

The Hyuuga heiress seemed just as stunned as you felt. But then again how does one react to the fact that their mobile potty had the energy OF ALL LIFE coursing through it?

Hesitantly she looked around. No one was near her, they were all with their friends and social cliques. Good. She really didn't want to be seen as crazy right now, she thought, as she looked back at her diap- the PERSON! Wraped around her waist.

"H-Hello?" she asked "Is anyone...in there?"

She was speaking to you! You had to find some way to answer! You tried to move anything, mentally straining, trying to force you body to move in some way.

And amazing, miraculously IT DID.

Hinata let out a soft 'eep!' as her former classmate managed to fluff himself his puffy body expanding and contracting.

Like fluffing a pillow, she thought dazedly.

That clinched it. Her classmate was still there! .....Somehow.

The heiress looked around again. Still no one.

"Listen. I don't how you're like this but this is good! It means there might be a way of saving you!" she whispered, excitedly "Try to find way to manipulate yours-URF!"

A massive cramp went through her gut.

"Uh oh....."

As close as you were to her, you could hear Hinata's bowels churning. That wasn't good.

"Ah! Look, just try to find a way to manipulate your body or chakra. I'll make sure you stay with me! And for what it's worth, again, I'm so sorry!" Hinata muttered.

You fluffed yourself to let her know you had heard. She nodded back slightly....

And released the floodgates.

Immediately you felt Hinata's mess slam into the back of you, feeling a mud like sensation as the load entered your body, pushing the plastic outwards in an avalanche of poop. Both Hinata and you, her diaper could feel the resulting mass coating her cheeks, bringing the diaper's shape into a continuous curve.

To her credit the pale eyed girl made not a noise or movement, throughout her....movement, other than her expanding underwear, a skill from having to discretely relieve herself at major political functions, something that all Clan kunoichi learned to do themselves.

Those not in the Clans though...., Hinata thought as she caught one of her classmates squat and noisily mess herself near the center of the courtyard.

Let's just say they didn't get many stealth missions.

As the Hyuuga Heiress finished emptying herself into her pants she flashed three one-handed seals when no one was looking.

"Hidden Soiled Diaper Technique!" she muttered. The moment the last syllable left her lips the smell and look of her deed vanished.

And not a moment to spare. The moment she finished her technique, Anko came out and called an end to lunch.

As Hinata got up to follow the others she whispered, "This Jutsu will last until the Acadamy lets out. After that we'll have time to come up with something"

You fluffed yourself in response, slightly squishing the mess against the girl's rear.


Hours later in class Hinata had messed herself again, and the class was waiting for the final lesson of the day to end. While Hinata took notes you took the liberty of gauging the other kunoichi in the room from the back where you and Hinata sat

Naruko all but seemed to be bouncing in her seat, the squelching from her butt indicating what she'd done. Energetic, that one, you thought.

Shina Aburame sat a few rows ahead the, hissing from her part of the room either her wet diaper or her kikaichu. Here's hoping she doesn't detect you. You didn't exactly know the decorum of checking a fellow Clan Heir's diaper without permission, if that was even a thing

Tsuki Uchiha was being fawned over by Ino and Sakura, ignoring the two fangirls even as she casually pushed a mess into her pants. A shame, you thought. She could use some friends to hang out with instead of going home to an empty clan compound every night, no one but herself to change her diapers. No warmth, no life.....

Choumei Akimchi, a......rotund girl that despite all she ate never managing to mess more than Hinata, and next to her Miko Nara, fast asleep with a soaked pamper and a pacifier necklace in her mouth, suckling away.

All while you take this in, you mould what chakra you can in an effort to find out......SOMETHING you can do. Besides fluff yourself like a cheap pillow.

About 45 minutes from the end of class you've discovered one thing and have a theory for another.

The first as you've learned, has turned you into something kunoichi would kill for: A self cleaning diaper that turns waste into chakra. You've successfully tested this on Hinata, by channeling chakra, whilst doing your fluffing routine, you essentially squished Hinata's mess into chakra, a result she felt when she found extra chakra flowing up from her tailbone and through her spine.

Definitely something to look into.

The other was a bit of a theory you wanted to test. You could obviously think straight, and you could move in a fashion but you couldn't really communicate with Hinata. But your subtle experiments during class may have bore fruit. You've managed to find what is essentially your chakra core for your diaper body, and you think that if you can connect to Hinata's own chakra network you could speak in a form of spiritual telepathy.

Theoretically anyway. That was not something you wanted to test in front of a class who turned the boys into wearable toilets.

But finally the bell rings, and Hinata, now fresh as a daisy heads....

1123333311111121.content:
Walking towards her door, Hinata opened it to find her younger sister standing behind it.

"Hanabi! How are you? I didn't see you on the way in!"

"I'm fine." Hanabi answered, giving a warm smile as she did, "I just wanted to spend time with you! Are you busy?"

"Umm......"

What could she do? She had promised her classmate that she would help! but this was her little sister! She couldn't just blow her off! Not without explaining why! She couldn't even lie her way out, not unless she wanted people asking questions! She was a terrible liar!!

'Sorry friend, looks like you'll have to wait a bit' "No, I'm not busy right now." She knelt down to Hanabi's height, "What did you have in mind?"

The younger Hyuuga "I wanted to ask about the stuff you learned in class! Did you learn any cool ninja stuff?!"

Hinata's smile faltered the tinniest bit. 'Oh yes, we learned something new alright' "Nothing you can do yet, I'm afraid." She ruffled Hanabi's hair.

The girl pouted, "Aww! But I heard you learned how to turn boys into diapers!"

"Well....." 'Where did she hear that?!'

Hanabi gasped. "You did, didn't you?!" She yanked up her sisters skirt. "I bet that diaper is some stupid boy, isn't it?!", she said as she poked said stupid boy.

"EEEP!"

"C'mon you gotta teach me! Please?" she looked up with Puppy Eyes.

Hinata yanked her skirt down and squirmed. 'What do I do?! The others are probably teach their little sisters this! Knowing Hanabi, if don't I don't teach her this, she complain to her friends, they'll tell their sisters, and then they'll come to me for explanations! Hrnnnnnn....'

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This was bad. Not only did Hinata's kid sister come looking for this technique, but people would become suspicious if she didn't teach her! And why wouldn't they? Apparently it was commonplace to turn men into diapers, but was kept secret until you learned how to in the ninja world. Some kind of Rite of Pass-

*SSSSSSSSSSSSSSS*

Your train of thought was interrupted as you felt warm liquid seep into your cushy body.

'And apparently Hinata stress pees. Great.'

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hinata shuddered as she wet herself and felt her diaper expand.

Hanabi on the other hand looked sheepish as she looked down, "Sorry sis, should remembered not to pressure you."

"It-It's okay Hanabi. Look, let me think about it while I finish and change, okay?" She sniffed the air and gave a small smile, "And it smells like you need one too."

The younger of the two blushed and nodded. "Okay. You promise you'll think about it?"

"I promise."

Hanabi gave a big grin. "Thanks big sis!" She waddled off for a diaper change.

Hinata on the other hand closed her door and slid down the down the wall, her wet diaper squelching as she did.

"Ohhhhhh! What do I do?! I don't want to give my sister this technique, but if I don't she'll hound me for it, or worse complain to mother!"

She got up and started to pace.

"There has to be someway for.....for...."

She stopped in the middle of the room as she felt a pressure in her gut.

"Uh oh....."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You thought to yourself as Hinata paced.

'There's got to be someway to get out of this. Some sort of compromise or-'

"Uh oh........"

You thought's ground to a halt as you heard Hinata speak, and heard her bowels churn and gurgle.

'I'll never get used to this' You mentally sighed, 'But ad the same time I hope I don't have to.'

You braced yourself.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Hmph! Urf!"

Hinata grunted, knees bent, as she tried to poop her diaper. She gasped out a breath and fell onto her butt, her diaper making a loud squish as it did.

"Oohhhhhh! I hope I'm not backed up......."

She leaned forward, hands balled into fists as she pushed.

Finnally, after what seemed like hours to the heiress, but mintues in reality, she felt her diaper begin to expand.

"Ahhhhhhhh........" she sighed in relief.

Crawling to her bed, she slumped her upper body on her mattress as she continued to fill her pants.

"I think I need to watch what I eat from now on." She mumbled into her sheets. Feeling a little better she stood up, and assessed the damage.

"........Oh my."

Her diaper was MASSIVE. It had, somehow, gotten big enough to stretch down to her knees, nearly below them in fact. And it had kept to a round shape instead of just sagging, she noticed, with a few bulges here and there.

"It looks like my rear got bigger, instead of me just messing my diaper!"

Absently she looked at the clock. "Oh no, Hanabi will be especting my answer any minute! And I'm too low on Chakra to use the Hidden Diaper Technique! What do should I do?!"

115333121.content:
When most people wake up they tend to stretch, work out the kinks in their muscles before going about their day.


However you are not most people. Because you are not technically a person anymore. You are a diaper. Specifically the diaper of Weiss Schnee, Heiress of the Schnee Dust Company.

So when you woke up, you really couldn't do anything except wait for Weiss to wake up. It gave you time to think back on how your situation had come to be.

In Remnant, the Grimm are fought and killed by Huntsman and Huntresses, more so of the latter. This is because most Huntresses and Huntresses in training turn their male counterparts into diapers.

The reason why is two fold. The first, is that when a Huntsman is turned into a diaper, the Huntress who wears him get a boost to her Aura, equal to what the former Huntsman had. When this was discovered, transformations became commonplace extremely quickly, all over the globe. This lead to the second reason.

Current day Huntresses were not potty trained.

Many Huntresses when they learned to transform men into diapers, figured, 'why use the toilet anymore when one is strapped to my waist?'

It was convenient and practical. There weren't any bathrooms in the open wilderness after all.

And when those Huntresses had girls of their own, they thought, 'why teach my potty train my daughter when she'll be in diapers as a Huntress anyway?' Most girls, most children, born into Hunter families tended to follow in the footsteps of their parents to begin with.

As a result of this, Huntresses became a dominant power in the world, and many laws reflected this in the current day and age.

It was, for example, completely legal to turn a man into a diaper if the one to do so was a Huntress.

And that was exactly what happened to you.

You had been a classmate to Weiss Schnee years ago, and you had had an above average Aura reserve.

It didn't take long for the obvious to happen.

The moment Weiss had turned you she had brought your now crinkly body back home to her room, and made....improvements.

When she had first turned you, you had been a basic, plain white diaper. After Weiss' 'modifications' you now had a, if you were completely honest, remarkably , intricate design across your plastic surface, with small decals scattered throughout. On your front was the Schnee crest in a powder blue color. On your back was a tree, the bark a silver color, and the leaves an emerald green.

Where there was still space, Weiss had sewn in arcane symbols, for both convenience and practicality. Instead of wearing pajama bottoms to be for example, she instead activated a small sigil on your 'seat' that kept her warm at night.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------

You had probably sat there for about an hour before the padded Heiress woke up for the day.

She got up, long hair frizzy from sleep, yawned, and stretched, before getting out of bed.

As she walked through the cold manor, she finnally came to the kitchen where there was a light blue highchair awaiting.

This was something of a common sight nowadays in many Hunter households, along with other similar items and furniture. Many Huntresses had reclaimed their inner child as time went on, as a way to de-stress from hunting Grimm most of the time. A way to unwind and simply indulge in relaxation before heading out int the wilderness again. And Weiss was no different.

As Weiss climbed into the highchair a maid came over with breakfast and wordlessly began to feed the Heiress with a small smile on her face.

From what you had seen, Weiss was favored by the help, out of the three Schnee siblings, to the point where the maids completely doted on her while she was home. It was helped that Weiss completely enjoyed it, mostly because of her upbringing as the Heiress, she hadn't had the best of childhood's.

As the maid fed Weiss her breakfast, you felt her tense, before moving into a familiar position, and heard soft grunts. The maid simply giggled, patted the Heiress on the head, and backed out of the room to give her charge some privacy, while you mentally sighed as you waited the inevitable.

Seconds later, Weiss pushed a massive load into your puffy form, grunting all the while. Your body crinkled and shifted to accommodate the mess Weiss was putting out, easily taking what the Huntress was throwing at it. The messy flow stopped for mere moments as Weiss caught her breath, panting, and lifted her bottom off the chair, before resuming her dirty deed.

After all was said and done, your plastic body had expanded five times it's normal size, squished against the sides and back of Weiss' highchair. How she put out all of that poo and still manage to soak the front, you would never know. You just chalked it up to 'being a Huntress' and left it at that.

As she finished pooping her pants, the Ice Queen sighed, before beginning to grind her diaper into her chair, letting out a low moan, every so often

That.......wasn't something you were sure about in Huntress culture. How much they.....liked their diapers. But then again you were kinda living said culture being what you were. It was normal for Weiss anyway. For the few years she had worn you, she would wake up, eat breakfast, poop and pee, and have her 'me time.'

With a small drawn out moan she.....finished, undid the tray on her chair and climbed down, giving the maid a beaming smile and a thank you, before going out into the hall.

That was another thing about Weiss. She loved being messy, and she stayed so as long as she could. Her own 'personal record' had been five days without activating the 'self-clean' rune on your body. She seemed remarkably resilient to diaper rash it seemed.

As she walked back into her room, she sat at her desk with a squish and wondered what to do for the day.

Should she have a day at home and pamper herself, or have a late night on the town?

11533333223311.title: Tatsumaki

115333332233111.content:
You had always dreamed of meeting your idol Tatsumaki, the terrible tornado. Something about her seemed so captivating to you. Was it her immense power? Was it the fact that she looked very young and beautiful? Maybe it was the mystery of whether or not she wore panties? You didn't quite know it yourself. Anyway, your dream might have just fullfilled itself as ou found yourself in a fight between the terrible tornado and a giant city destroying lizard monster. Which coincidentally happened right next to your house. Well... former house. There wasn't much left of it now. You didn't have much time to wonder how you got out of there without a scratch, as you saw what had happened to the monster.

There was a giant corpse right in front of you. And in the sky... you saw her. The terrible tornado herself, Tatsumaki. This was it, this was your chance. You could finally meet her. But maybe you shouldn't disturb her, she was probably busy doing her hero work. Someone like you would probably only anger her. But... she did just destroy your house, didn't she? Even if the hero association would probably fix what she had destroyed, she could atleast make up for it by talking with you. Or acknowledge you were even there in the first place, as there was no sign she even noticed you at all. It almost looked like she was distracted with something else, as she crossed her arms over her stomach.

She looked around for a bit, seemingly searching for something. All the while, still not noticing you. Or maybe she did notice you, but simply didn't care you were there. After she looked around for a bit, she closed her eyes. At first nothing happened, but then something started to move underneath her dress. You couldn't quite make out what it was, so you moved a little closer. In hindsight you should have known better. Now standing directly underneath her, you saw something white poking out underneath her dress. So she did wear panties. Or was that... No. Why would she wear something like that? But as you stood there and observed the situation, heard the soft grunts that escaped her mouth and saw the small bulge which slowly pushed out at the back of her "panties", you simply couldn't deny it anymore.

Tatsumaki, the terrible tornado, the woman who just killed a giant monster in front of you, was currently in the process of messing her diaper. Due to the sudden realization you couldn't stop yourself from letting out a short "what?", a mistake you would quickly regret, as you felt yourself being lifted up in the air. Shortly after, you came face to face with the green haired esper, her expression told you more than enough. It's a good thing she couldn't just kill you here and then, because you were just a citizen. But that also meant you would have to go through the trouble of explaining this situation to her and considering from which direction you just came from, you probably wouldn't leave here unscarred.

Lying wasn't even an option, perhaps you should tell her exactly what happened. Given the silence, she was expecting you to do so. But she didn't seem to give you much time to come up with an explanation. "Just what do you think, you were doing down there?":she asked. As you were still searching for a good explaination, she started to willently shake you in the air:"Out with it or I might just drop you." Looking down to the ground beneath you, you were sure that falling down from here would definetely break some bones, it might even kill you if you were unlucky. So much for being safe because you are a citizen. "Well...": you stuttered, letting out a nervous laugh:"You kinda destroyed...my house and so I..."

But she didn't let you finish your sentence as she started to shake you again:"I don't care about your stupid house, I was asking you what you were doing down there." You started to feel a little sick from being shaken around so much. Not having enough time to think through what you would say to her next, considering that she was about to drop you, you went with the only thing that came to your mind: "I...was looking...up." For a brief second you saw the corners of her mouth go down, before she calmed herself: "You saw it didn't you? That's why you reacted that way, right? Don't lie to me." There wasn't much you could do now. She seemed very sensitive about this subject. And after you saw this happen, she probably would have a hard time letting you go with this knowledge.

"I won't tell anyone. You have my wo...": you weren't able to finish your sentence, as she let you fall to the ground. But as fast as it started, it ended too. Hitting the ground, you didn't immediately feel the pain, as it slowly started to go through your body. You couldn't move, several of your bones were broken and you noticed that it became increasingly hard for you to breath. Your windpipe must have taken damage and was now filling up with your blood. Tatsumaki slowly descended downwards, looking at you, before she landed right next to you. With an expression of disgust, she looked down at your deformed body:"I know you won't tell anyone. Let's get this over with quickly." And with that she positioned herself over your body, her diaper in full view for you, and sat down on your face, trying to speed up your suffocation. As you slowly lost conciousness, you thought about how ridiculous this way of kicking the bucket was. Getting killed by a hero, who was actually supposed to protect you, but valued the secret of what underwear she wears more than your life. Then everything went black.

- - - - - -

So this was it, huh? This was how you would leave this world. All the pain you had felt was gone. You couldn't see your surroundings. There was no sound, smell or taste anymore. Everything was just...gone. But yet, you were still able to think. You were able to react to this... nothingness. Was this... purgatory? Neither heaven nor hell, just nothingness? What would happen now? Would this just continue like this forever? Suddenly there was a green glow, as everything around you lit up. Were they currently deciding whether or not you should go to heaven or hell? Then the light stopped and you felt something touching your body. Then there was a sound, as you felt how your body was being moved by someone else.

What was happening right now? Without thinking about it, you opened your eyes. The only thing you saw at first was the ground, then a smell hit your nose. Following the direction of the smell, you saw the source. It was a full diaper, just laying there on the ground. What was it doing there? And why did it look awfully similar to the one Tatsumaki wore? You looked around a bit more and noticed that you were surrounded by two... you weren't quite sure if your eyes decieved you... were those... legs? You quickly figured out that these legs didn't belong to you, as they didn't move when you wanted them to. Infact they were way to small to be your legs and you didn't wear shoes like that.

But if those weren't your legs, the owner of those legs had to be on top of you. But as you tried to look up, the only thing you saw was darkness. Either there was nothing above you or something was blocking your view. Having not many other options you looked down again at these shoes. You noticed that you had seen them before. Infact you knew exactly to which person these shoes belonged to. But this couldn't be right, Tatsumaki was this tall. If you were this small in comparison to her legs, she had to be a giant. And why were you floating in the air between her legs. This didn't make sense.

"Ughh, waiting for you to figure this one out by yourself is unbearable. How dense are you? I turned you into a diaper, you idiot.": Tatsumaki's voice echoed through your ears. What? She turned you into a diaper? That means she is... "Wearing you now. That's right. I'm surprised you even got through school with this failure of a brain. And before you start thinking about why I did that -seriously just spare me from this, I can hear everything you think- as you know I'm not allowed to kill citizens. But I'm not exactly keen on letting you just run around, possibly leaking this secret to some reporter, searching for the perfect story. I was in dire need of a diaper change, so I figured a piece of shit like you would be the perfect candidate as a replacement. You should be thankful, your body was useless after falling down. Nothing more than a useless piece of bloody meat. I gave you a purpose though. But now stay quiet, I have no intention of wasting any more of my time with talking to a mere diaper like you.":she said as you saw the ground underneath you move away from you. She was flying somewhere now. But where?

1311111.title: As part of a science experiment.

choices: Shepard agreed to be permanently turned into Tali 's diaper.
13111111.content:
Shepard was making his way back to his quarters after a long and restless night aboard the normandy. "I'm so tired" he thought to himself as he slowly made his way to his room, "I need to start getting more sleep".

Finally, after what felt like hours, Shepard was face to face with his bed. Without hesitation he collapsed onto it next to Tali, ( his girlfriend) who was startled awake by the sudden shift of weight next to her. She looked over at Shepard who was already halfway dreaming and latex back down herself.

" Your home late" she jokingly said to shepard.

" Sorry" he said realising he had working her up. "I'll try to get tomorrow off" was all he could say before once again starting to drift off.

"Maybe if you say no" said Tali as the young Quarian drifted off to sleep soon followed by shepard.

The next day Shepard woke up feeling refreshed and called the crew telling them that he would be taking the day off. He noticed that Tali was in the kitchen cooking him breakfast and walked up behind her then hugged her from behind and saying "Good morning" .

"Go shower and get dressed" she said seriously, "I need to talk with you over breakfast"

In the shower Shepard was thinking about what Tali was talking about and why she sounded so upset. "Maybe if you say no" he vaguely remembered her saying the night before, but he could not figure out what she meant by that. After showering shepard quickly got dressed and made his way back to Tali who had just finished cooking his some pancakes with a side of eggs.

"Listen, I have something to ask you" she said as serious as a heartattack. " It concerns your future and I want you to know that I'm not going to force you to do anything". After hearing this shepard was wondering if she was pregnant or maybe about to break up with him, but instead she simply continued with her proposial. " I need a favor but I want you to want to help me, so if after you have heard what I'm about to say you can say no and that will be the end off it. OK? "

"I understand" said Shepard leaning in closer to Tali and placing his hand on her shoulder. "You know that I would do anything to help you right".

Tali smiled lovingly at this, although Shepard was unable to see it do to the protective suit that she was wearing. " You say that now but after you hear what I'm about to say you will probably fell differently". "As you know all quarians have to wear these suits due to us having extremely weak immune systems right" said Tali to which Shepard nodded in silence. " Well I have recently discovered a way to theoretically bust a quarians immune system to any particular disease and in only a matter of days"

"That's great news" said Shepard both excited and in anticipation. "Just tell me what I need to do to help and I'll be in it right away".

Tali smiled and said, "That's what I was getting to, you see when is quarians need to use the bathroom, most of the time we end up having to go in our suit in specialised sealed off bags that we dispose of later"

"Ok so where do I come in"? Shepard said confused.

"I'm glad you asked", Tali said with anticipation in her voice. "You see, the reason we have to keep our own waste completely separate from ourselves is because the quarians immune system is to weak to fight off any pathogens or diseases they might be carrying" "But with the immune system of a species like humans or asari, their is significantly less risk of getting sick right away when exposed to bodily waste" "What I want to do is combine your human immune system with the immune system of a quarrian, kind of like grafting skin in order to heal a wound; and since I'm the only quarian on board I will have to be the test subject"

After saying all this Tali stated at Shepard for a moment, who still looked perplexed by what she was asking. Noticing that he had not even started eating his breakfast she countinued.

"Now is the part where you come in, and remember you can say no at any time" she continued. "I chose to ask you because we have been intimate on more than one occasion and my immune system has already adapted to you, so if anything goes wrong during the experiment I would only have to fight off the infectious elements of my own waste".

" Makes enough sense" Shepard said trying to hide the rising sense of unease he was feeling.

"To do this you would have to be in constant contact with me and my waste, as well as being able to transfer your immune system to me in the first place" Tali said quietly with a mix of fear and excitement in her eyes.

"And how would I do that?" Asked Shepard who was now very clearly uneasy and had the unmistakable sound of dread in his voice.

" Well simply put you cant, not in your own body at least, but is you were something else designed specifically for that purpose than you might be able to with the right improvements". She paused for what felt like an eternity before finally saying,

"I want to make you into a diaper!"

She said it as quickly as possible, obviously embarrassed and although Shepard couldn't see it, he cheeks flushed bright red. Shepard mean while could only sit there frozen in shock at what he had just heard. About a minute went by in complete silence before either one of them spoke.

"I'm know it sounds scary and hard to believe, but I've done my research and it is completely possible to turn you into a diaper while leaving your immune system and your mind intact" "You would still be able to see and hear, and I would take really good care off you while you're being worn".

" How long would it be? ", was all Shepard could say still to stunned by what he was hearing to say anything else.

" I would only have to wear you for about a week without changing you for the procedure to be complete, but if we went through with the entire transfer you would lose your immune system completely with no way to regain it". Tali said almost teasingly, "And without your human immune system their would simply be no way to turn you back, you would be stuck as a diaper forever".

" And I'm sorry to say that I wouldn't keep you either. I have no use for a week old dirty diaper and it's not like we could still date. so when your week is over I will just throw you in the trash and forget about you". "But if it makes you feel any better I would miss you after you were gone", Tali said lovingly.

" I know I'm asking you to sacrifice your entire life for this but think about how many people we would be helping, all the quarians in the migrant fleet wouldn't have to live the rest of their lives in these suits ".

" And it would mean a lot to me to " Tali said finishing her speech and leaving Shepard to decide his fate.

13233312.title: Lillie

132333121.content:
You and Lillie were walking to the next city. The two of you knew each other for a few days by now. You met her on the Mahalo trail. Back then she was looking for information about her pokemon Nebby and she thought she might get some in the ruins of conflict. The whole thing ended with you protecting Nebby. And since then Lillie and you are travelling together. She was still looking for information about Nebby and you wanted to beat the Alola trials.

Right now you took a break from the constant walking and sat down on the grass. Lillie sat down beside you. Putting her bag in front of her she looked for some snacks. This was part of your everyday life by now. Lillie was always buying some food in a nearby town and everytime the two of you were walking through the wilderness you took a break to eat something. You didn't have much time to cook something.

Unfortunately Lillie had to put the food into the bag. And this often led to Nebby eating some of it. The little pokemon was always carried around in this bag and Lillie insisted on it. Bad things could happen if someone would see it. Some grunts wanted to steal it before but you managed to beat them.

As Lillie opened the bag Nebby flew out of it. It never really wanted to stay in the bag. "Nebby get back in the bag.":Lillie said. You had probably heard these words a million times by now. Nebby always tried to get out of the bag as soon as it saw an opportunity to do so. The small Pokemon of course tried to have some fun outside of it's prison. It flew around the area, happy to be outside.

Lillie chased after it. If anyone would see Nebby it could be in trouble so she had to catch it as fast as possible. Meanwhile you looked into the bag to find only one chocolate bar and nothing more. Nebby had eaten everything else. Sure the next city wasn't far away by now but this wouldn't be enough for the two of you. "I got it. ":Lillie said as she came back with Nebby in her arms. Seeing the look in your eyes and the chocolate bar in your hand Lillie knew exactly what had happened.

"Oh, not again. ":she said. "I told you we shouldn't put the food in the same bag as Nebby. Next time we should put it in mine. ":You said. "But there is nearly no space in there. It's full of pokeballs and other items. "Lillie said. "Well it's better than to let this little thing eat all of it. So, what are going to do now? This is barely enough for one of us.":you asked.

Both of you thought in silence before a loud grumble could be heard. Looking in the direction where it came from you saw Lillie with a very red face :"I think I should get it. " But you could also feel your stomach rumble:" The last time this happened you also got the food. I think I should get it. " Lillie walked closer, forgetting that she was carrying Nebby she began to grab the chocolate bar.

Making a pouty face she said :"Be a gentleman and give a girl what she needs." You tried to shake her off :"I'm starving Lillie. I have to eat something too. " While you were fighting, Nebby was inbetween everything and looked at you two. It didn't want you to fight but it wasn't strong enough to stop it from happening. The stress of the situation made Nebby glow in a bright light.

The next thing you saw was the ground. What happened? "Huh? What did just happen? Where are you (Name)? Guess I get to eat the chocolate bar then. ":You heard Lillie say. Where was she? And why couldn't you move? You could hear the packaging being ripped off. She was in the process of eating the chocolate bar. Why couldn't you do something about it? What did Nebby do to you?

"Get in the bag Nebby.":Lillie said while eating the chocolate bar. You could hear how she closed the bag. "Now that that's finished where is (Name)?I hope Nebby didn't use it's teleport again. " You could feel your body being strechted out from something. It didn't hurt but it was a strange feeling. "(Name)!(Name)! Where are you? ":Lillie shouted. Before you could even answer you felt yourself being strechted again. "What is that? ":Lillie said. Finally you could see more than the ground as the sun began to shine into your face. Looking up you saw Lillie's face. She looked surprised and disgusted at the same time. Why?

"A... diaper?! ":Lillie said. A diaper? Why did she call you a diaper? No. No. No this couldn't be true. "Why am I wearing a diaper? ":Lillie said. You could feel yourself being strechted out again as Lillie tried to pull you off of her. But nothing happened. "Why can't I get this thing off of me? I am too old for something like this. ":she said. Why did this happen?... Nebby. It was probably the reason this had happened. Meanwhile Lillie was having an emotional breakdown about the fact that she was now back in this infantile garment.

You had to tell Lillie about what had happened to you. Could you even talk? You had to try. It's the only way sie could help you. You didn't want to stay like this. What if she... had to use you? No. You didn't want to think about that. You had to get your body back. So you tried to talk to her:"Lillie can you hear me? "

You decided to interfere:" To late. I saw everything. I will report that to the principal. " They just looked at you and laughed. "You won't even get us ": said Chloe. "Yeah but next time don't beat our source up okay? I really don't want to rewind time that much. " "So you rewind time again, huh? It would have felt good to beat that motherfucker up. Well atleast I did it in that other timeline. Did something else happen after I beat him up? " "Yes there was a guy who saw us and he tried to catch me before I went back in time. The last thing I remember was that he fell on top of me. Since then I can't walk that well. He must have hurt my legs. " "Now that you mention it Max why is your butt bigger? " So Max put her pants down. Suddenly you saw again. "Max why do you wear a diaper? " "I don't know. Must have been an unknown sideffect of timetravelling. See that's why we shouldn't mess with this power. Help me get this thing off." "Now you should better watch that you don't mess yourself. Atleast you got protection. ": Chloe said while laughing. You couldn't believe it. You were transformed into a diaper by a girl who could rewind time. But you didn't want to stay like that forever and your only chance of getting out of this situation was Max who now tried to get you off of her. Luckily they couldn't get you off of her. "Guess then you have to wear that thing until we find a way to get it off. " "But how did this even happen to me?" You tried to talk to them:" Hey I think I know how this happened. Chloe looked at you like you were a ghost : "Did your diaper just talk?" "It did but I didn't know that I had the power to turn people into objects. But I think you are right. As you fell on me you must have been transformed. " "Max that power is awesome. Imagine what we could do to all those people we don't like. Just wrap them around your ass and let the punishment begin. " You were angry about that comment of Chloe :" Yeah I would like to have my body back before she decides to use me, thanks. And remember you can't get these diapers off of you that easily. It would be nice if you could help." Max thought about what to do.

13533313321.content: Your in a small boat, out on the open sea, just you and the waves. You've made a decent living collecting treasures from the ocean floor, but today you can't seem to find anything. Still, the sun is high and you have a long day ahead of you. Suddenly, you hear a sound, like huge wings flapping. "Heeeeey!" a voice yells down at you. You look up and see a red haired Rito lowering down into your small raft. She's a cute young girl, but she has a rather embarrassed look on her face. "Um... Erm... Could you... Give me a hand with something?" she asks, clearly seeming flustered. Speechless, you nod. "Um, sure, whatever you want." She adorable, and you want nothing more than to make her happy. "You sure? Its kinda...gross." Maybe this was her bird mating season? Whatever it was, she seemed to be fidgeting with the hem of her dress quite a bit. You quickly nod yes. "Of course, anything!" Suddenly, she lifts her hands, and you feel yourself begin to change. You feel yourself becoming something... Soft, slick, thick and fluffy. You now are looking straight up into the sky. She steps over to you. "Um, if you can hear me, I promise I'll try to change you back when I get the chance, I just..." she lifter her dress, and to your shock, just inches above it was a thick, plastic, and very full diaper hanging several inches below her hips. "I've been out of diapers for three days, and I have just, the worst rash, but I really can't let anyone else know about my... Um... Problem." She undoes the tapes of her diaper and it falls to the deck with a heavy splat. She pulls wipes out of a bag she has and wipes herself down, before reaching down, unfolding you, and taping you onto her body. "There we go! Oh my, that's so much better..." She then turns to jump off the boat and fly away.

1353333311.title: Tracer (Lena Oxton)

13533333111.content:
"I'm very sorry, but we simply aren't able to grant large loans at the moment." The cashier says impatiently.
"You don't understand, I just lost my job and I just need some money to help me get back on my feet" you say pleadingly. You should have known the bank would be completely unwilling to help. The woman behind the desk again dismisses your request robotically, staring at you with a nonchalant expression which quickly turns to shock and fear as she glances behind you. Confused, you turn around to see 5 men in balaclavas burst through the door, automatic weapons in hand, ordering everyone to get on the ground.
Shit.
A bank robbery.

With no other choice available, you dive to the floor as the men advance towards the counter, waving their rifles around and making demands already. The woman who had been so stern-faced and unsympathetic a moment ago is now stricken with fear, shaking violently as she frantically grabs money from the tills to satisfy the intruders. You feel the need to help, but there's nothing you can do. They have guns and all you have is a pair of fists. Minutes go by agonisingly slowly, the thieves keeping everyone on the floor but the staff who are paying their ransom.
Suddenly, the atmosphere changes as a slender female figure appears in the doorway, zipping into the room impossibly quickly with a flash of blue light. Clad in her distinctive brown and orange attire, this hero needs no introduction.
"Cheer up everyone, Tracer's here!" she says with a cute and bubbly cockney accent. The intruders have little time to react before the woman disarms and dispatches them one by one in a flurry of rapid movements. The inhabitants of the bank can only watch as the thieves prove no match for the hero, quickly reducing them to a pile of comically unconscious bodies. With a swift kick to the face she finishes off the last one and dusts herself off, grinning merrily.

Seeing that it's finally safe, you get to your feet and run over to the hero to thank her.
"Hello, love" she greets you with a cheeky grin.
Tracer is as beautiful in real life as she is in the posters, her cute face beaming at you with two large eyes beneath the orange visor. You can't help but notice her tight spandex leggings, hugging her long slender legs and shapely ass.
"That was... incredible!" you stammer gratefully. "Thank you Tracer!"
"No problem" she replies, giving a humorous salute. "It wasn't exactly a difficult fight"
You begin to tell Tracer how much of a fan you are of her and the Overwatch team, and how much you wish that you could be a hero just like them, but Lena begins to shift uncomfortably.
"Alright well thanks love that's really kind of you but I've got things to attend to so I gotta dash..."
She begins to walk away, and the thought of stopping such a powerful hero almost scares you, but this is an opportunity you may never get again. You seize your opportunity and grab her arm lightly.
"Please" you continue, "I've just lost my job and I really don't have much else to do. If there's anything I can do to help then let me help. I'm sick of living a boring life and I want to help heroes like you, no matter what the risks are."
For a moment Tracer seems taken aback by your speech, but whatever is causing her to be uncomfortable soon returns.
"Alright love, I just 'ave something I need to go and do and I'll be right ba... oh shit." Suddenly the woman's hands fly to her crotch and she blushes with embarrassment as a dark patch expands in her orange leggings between her legs. She tries her best to hide it but there's no concealing what has happened.
"Tracer are you okay?" you say guiltily. "I'm sorry, I didn't realise you needed the toilet..."
"No it's alright, love, it's not your fault really, I've been 'aving troubles with my bladder recently and I just never get time to go because I'm always so bloody busy."
She quickly runs to a more secluded area to avoid more people noticing and you follow, struggling to keep up with her pace.

"Peeing myself in the middle of a bank. Nice one Lena - great job!" she mutters to herself. You try to console her.
"Well I'm not judging you, and nobody else should be either. Just because you have a little toilet problem doesn't mean you're not a badass hero who saves people's lives everyday. Anyone who doesn't respect and admire you is an idiot."
She doesn't seem quite convinced, but she smiles at you, grateful for the compliments.
"Thanks love, the world needs more people like you."
"Like I said, anything I can do to help. The world needs more people like you."
There is a pause for a moment. The woman is flattered by your kind words, but seems hesitant to say what she is about to tell you.
"Look, you seem like a genuinely nice person who wants to help, and the truth is, there is one way you can... and it's weird and you might not like it because, well... you might find it a bit disgusting."
"What kind of disgusting?" you enquire.
